attributes.action: give people a reduced rate of £1 for membership of political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give people a chance to get into politics via reduced rate of membership of parties.

the reduction and loss of income of parties to be funded by  reductions in the cost of funding mps and lords in the houses of parliament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
